Notes.Text:
This update for cairo fixes the following issues:

- CVE-2019-6461: Avoid assert when drawing arcs with NaN angles. (bsc#1122338)
- CVE-2025-50422: Fix NULL pointer access in `active_edges_to_traps()` leading to crash in Poppler. (bsc#1247589)
Notes.Title: Details

Vulnerabilities.Description: An issue was discovered in cairo 1.16.0. There is an assertion problem in the function _cairo_arc_in_direction in the file cairo-arc.c.

Vulnerabilities.Description: Cairo through 1.18.4, as used in Poppler through 25.08.0, has an "unscaled->face == NULL" assertion failure for _cairo_ft_unscaled_font_fini in cairo-ft-font.c.
